data.name: Colonize Mars
data.detailed_description: You Will Go Through the Process of Trying to Colonize Mars in a low poly adventure and you might fail But Let's Find Out. You Will Go Through Fighting Creatures trying to colonize mars and you might end up finding some interesting structures while you are on mars, but you can expect to die trying to colonize mars in this first-person low poly adventure. You Will Have to Fight Creatures trying to colonize mars you will get a weapon on your mission, and you will be able to obtain new weapons in the process of colonizing mars you will have to talk to a person at the space facility to start your mission and in your mission, you will gain weapons and vehicles in the process of colonizing mars
data.about_the_game: You Will Go Through the Process of Trying to Colonize Mars in a low poly adventure and you might fail But Let's Find Out. You Will Go Through Fighting Creatures trying to colonize mars and you might end up finding some interesting structures while you are on mars, but you can expect to die trying to colonize mars in this first-person low poly adventure. You Will Have to Fight Creatures trying to colonize mars you will get a weapon on your mission, and you will be able to obtain new weapons in the process of colonizing mars you will have to talk to a person at the space facility to start your mission and in your mission, you will gain weapons and vehicles in the process of colonizing mars
data.short_description: Go through a low poly adventure trying to colonize mars and who know you might fail and have to try again, and you guys are here to find out so let's find out if you are worthy enough to colonize mars and go through an adventure that might lead to you have to try again.
